Articles.Content:
OK, just decided to restart a new clean build to fix a lot of my messed up mods. Then I checked the tracking station thinking that maybe I would get an encounter or an impactor.

Then I checked one... First one was going to be a hit. Checked the second one. THAT WAS ALSO GONNA HIT... Guess Jeb has been cursing Kod again.

So now I've gotta figure out what I am going to do. Both are class C so they should be easy to catch and release.
Eh, you'll be fine. Just ask the Krussians for all the dash-cam footage after the event(s), should make for some entertaining television.
I'm kind of wondering if there is mod to enhance the chance for asteroids to impact kerbin. It may be fun for some hardcore players. XD

One of my friends had a Class E, a Class D, and two Class C's on one collision course, all ready to hit within a single month.

That's probably why he deleted that save and started a new one.
